history.proof: qsimpl time: 1. qsimpl time: 1 use: Lim_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: Lim_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rbar_plus_correct,Lim_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rbar_plus_correct,Lim_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rbar_plus_correct,Lim_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rbar_plus_correct,Lim_correct.

exceptions.tactic: apply ex_lim_ext_loc with (fun y => f y + g y).

original: intros Hf Hg Hplus. destruct Hf as [lf Hlf]. destruct Hg as [lg Hlg]. apply Lim_correct in Hlf. apply Lim_correct in Hlg. apply ex_lim_ext_loc with (fun y => f y + g y). - apply is_lim_plus with (lf := lf) (lg := lg). + apply Hlf. + apply Hlg. + apply Rbar_plus_correct. apply Hplus. - exists (Rbar_plus lf lg). apply is_lim_plus with (lf := lf) (lg := lg). + apply Hlf. + apply Hlg. + apply Rbar_plus_correct. apply Hplus.
